body.name: Stove Top Cover for Electric Stove (28.5”x 20.5”), Heat Resistant Glass Cooktop Cover, Multipurpose Stove/Counter/Washer Top Protector, Dishwasher Safe Natural Rubber (Thankful)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Protective and Elegant Stove Top Cover】PAHTTO stovetop cover is designed to cover your stove top and protect the glass or ceramic surface from dust, scratches, scrapes, grease and dirt. It's not only protective and practical, but also decorative to your kitchen with nice patterns.

【28.5"x20.5" Extra Large Counter Space】With a large size of 28.5”x 20.5”, this anti-slip stove top cover widely fits for most two-burner stove tops, which provides an additional counterspace for food preparation and allows you to make full use of the space over.

【Heat Resistant Up to 400°F】With high heat resistance to withstand temperature up to 400°F /200°C, our glass cooktop cover can be used not only as a heat insulating mattress to protect your kitchen table surface, but also as a temporary ironing mat and washer top cover.

【Quality Dishwasher Safe Material】Made of high quality natural rubber, the electric stove top cover is easy to clean by simply wiping it with a wet cloth or putting it into a dishwasher. It’s easy for storage as it’s foldable to pack into your cupboard or closet.

【Bonus Accessories】Additional to the stove top cover, package also includes 2x Silicone Stove Gap Cover and 2x Hooks. The gap covers conform to stove and counter surface perfectly to prevent gunk and debris sticking in the gap. The hooks are useful to hang the stove cover on the wall, for simple storage when not use or for protecting the kitchen wall from oil splashes.
body.description: Electric Stovetop Cover (Thankful, Grateful, and Truly Blessed)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this stove cover mat. Saving my cooktop !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It covers the top of my ceramic stove top perfectly. It is very durable and exceeded my expectations. I bought one for my Mom and she loves it also. Gives you extra counter space if you have a small kitchen. I would highly recommend buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is really beautiful on my new stove. It’s a glass top and I was nervous about scratching it because I drop everything! This is a nice way to protect it and keep your kitchen looking beautiful at the same time. When not in use you can hang it on the wall next to your stove like I do. it has a little loops for hanging and it looks great. I do recommend this product. I did also purchase another silicone mat to put under it because I didn’t think it needed extra protection with me dropping things the way I do. It’s not as thick as it could be , but it’s still well worth it. I was on the fence about giving it five stars, I went with four because I think it would be really nice if it were a little thicker for more shock protection if you drop something. But if you’re just looking for scratch protection, then this is five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks perfect as a cover and can stand the heat!
reviews.reviewText: I love how this looks on my stove top. It makes the whole top look clean and when I'm using the oven, I don't have to move it because it's heat resistant. I also can put hot things on top of it. I only need to remove it while using the stove, of course, but it's easy to move to the side or hang up. I love that it comes with hooks to hang it. Very happy with my purchase!
